TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceRemotingRequestMessageBody

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that must be implemented to provide Request Message Body for remoting requests . This contains all the parameters remoting method has.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetParameter (int position, string parameName, Type paramType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetParameter(int32 position, string parameName, class System.Type paramType) cil managed
Public Function GetParameter (position As Integer, parameName As String, paramType As Type) As Object
abstract member GetParameter : int * string * Type -> obj

Docs.param: Position of the parameter in Remoting Method.
Parameter Name in the Remoting Method
Docs.summary: This is used to retrive parameter from request body before dispatching to service remoting method.
Docs.returns: The parameter that is at the specified position and has the specified name.

Docs.param: Position of the parameter in Remoting Method.
Parameter Name in the Remoting Method
Docs.summary: This Api gets called to set remoting method parameters before serializing/dispatching the request.
